column6: 1. Verify storage pool status; 2. Check replication factor (RF3); 3. Validate deduplication enabled; 4. Test compression

column5: Both 6454 FIs installed; Cluster mode enabled
column6: 1. Verify FI cluster status; 2. Test failover by powering off FI-A; 3. Verify traffic on FI-B; 4. Restore FI-A
column7: Cluster operational; Failover completes <30 seconds; No traffic loss

column6: 1. Claim HyperFlex in Intersight; 2. Verify device connector status; 3. Check inventory sync; 4. Test monitoring

column7: ESXi installed on all nodes; HX datastore visible; Network operational

column6: 1. Deploy vCenter Appliance; 2. Add ESXi hosts to datacenter; 3. Create HyperFlex cluster; 4. Verify management

column6: 1. Enable HA on cluster; 2. Configure admission control; 3. Test VM restart on host failure; 4. Verify HA status

column6: 1. Enable DRS on cluster; 2. Set automation level; 3. Test vMotion between hosts; 4. Verify load balancing

column6: 1. Create VM from template; 2. Customize VM settings; 3. Power on VM; 4. Verify network connectivity

column4: Validate live VM migration between hosts
column6: 1. Select running VM; 2. Initiate vMotion to target host; 3. Verify VM continuity; 4. Check no packet loss

column6: 1. Select running VM; 2. Initiate storage vMotion; 3. Monitor migration progress; 4. Verify data integrity
column7: Migration completes; Data integrity verified; No downtime

column5: VLANs configured on FIs; Port groups created

column6: 1. Deploy IO generator tool; 2. Run 4K random read/write test; 3. Measure IOPS and latency; 4. Compare to baseline

column6: 1. Migrate small VM (2GB); 2. Migrate medium VM (16GB); 3. Migrate large VM (64GB); 4. Record times
column7: Small <30s; Medium <2min; Large <5min

column6: 1. Deploy additional workload VMs; 2. Monitor CPU utilization; 3. Verify DRS balancing; 4. Check no over-commitment

column4: Validate cluster resilience to node failure
column6: 1. Gracefully shut down one node; 2. Monitor VM restart; 3. Verify data availability; 4. Measure recovery time
column7: VMs restart on remaining nodes; Data intact; Recovery <15 minutes

column6: 1. Simulate disk failure; 2. Verify data accessible; 3. Monitor rebuild process; 4. Validate data integrity
column7: Data remains accessible; Rebuild completes; No data loss

column6: 1. Delete test VM; 2. Initiate restore from backup; 3. Verify VM restored; 4. Validate data integrity
column7: VM restored successfully; RTO <15 minutes; Data intact

column6: 1. Disconnect FI-A uplinks; 2. Verify traffic on FI-B; 3. Monitor failover time; 4. Restore FI-A

column5: Roles and users configured; AD integrated

column6: 1. Verify vCenter HTTPS; 2. Check Intersight TLS; 3. Validate management traffic encryption; 4. Test certificate validity

column6: 1. Attempt cross-VLAN access; 2. Verify firewall blocking; 3. Test network segmentation; 4. Check audit logs
